titles.title: 686 My Times Of Sorrow And Of Joy (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My times of sorrow and of joy
Great God are in Thy hand
My choicest comforts come from Thee
And go at Thy command

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If Thou shouldst take them all away
Yet would I not repine
Before they were possesed by me
They were entirely Thine

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nor would I drop a murmuring word
Though the whole world were gone
But seek enduring happiness
In Thee and Thee alone

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
What is the world with all its store
'Tis but a bitter sweet
When I attempt to pluck the rose
A pricking thorn I meet

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Here perfect bliss can ne'er be found
The honey's mixed with gall
Midst changing scenes and dying friends
Be Thou my all in all
